data.title: Can a phone turn on without battery? - Samsung Galaxy S6
data.meta_description: Hello everyone. I am trying to fix this Galaxy S6. Mangaged to open it all and removed the battery. I assumed it was the battery because of how the phone died. I dont have a replacement battery tho, because i dont want to spend money on something that might not be the problem. My question is, can... - Samsung Galaxy S6
data.text:
Hello everyone. I am trying to fix this Galaxy S6. Mangaged to open it all and removed the battery. I assumed it was the battery because of how the phone died. I dont have a replacement battery tho, because i dont want to spend money on something that might not be the problem.

My question is, can it still be powered if I remove the battery and try to turn it on directly connected to micro usb power?
